Translations.Text: Arau te'omlokara majata yiye ka’ba, ‘allahara bahirae maye'i ilaha’, taka ami jahannamara sastira pratidana dima; e'idarae'i ami yalimasakalaka pratidana di'om

Yisakale kupharai karae sihamte dekha na'i neki ye, akasasamuha arau prthirai otapraotabharae milita hai achila, tara pichata ami ubhayaka prthaka karai dilo; arau praanabana sakalo bastuke panira paraa srsti karailo; tathapi'o sihamte imana posana nakaraiba ne
arau prthiraita ami srsti karaicho sudrrha parbata, yate prthiraiye sihamtaka lai tharaka-baraka nakarae, arau tata ami taiyara karaicho prasasta patha, yate sihamte gantabyasthalata gai paya
Arau ami akasaka karaicho suraksita cada; kintu sihamte akasata arasthita nidarsanaralira paraa mukha ghuraa'i laya
Arau allahe'i srsti karaiche raati arau dina, surya arau candra; pratyeke'i nija nija kaksapathata bicarana karae
Arau ami tomara purbe'o kono manuhaka cirajirai karaa nachilo, gatike yadi tumi mrtyubarana karaa tente sihamte cirajirai hai thakiba neki
pratito jira'i mrtyura soraada grahana karaiba; ami tomalokaka bhala arau beyara dbaraa bisesabharae paraiksa karai thako, arau amara ocarate'i tomalokara ubhati ahiba lagiba

Arau yisakale kupharai karae sihamte yetiya tomaka dekhe tetiya sihamte kerala tomaka upahasara patra hicapehe grahana karae. Sihamte kaya, ‘e'omrae'i se'ijana neki, yiye tomalokara upasyaboraka lai samalocana karae’?, Athaca sihamte'i rahamanara alocanara biraodhita karae
Manuhaka srstiye karaa haiche kharadhara praranatarae, atisighrae ma'i sihamtaka mora nidarsanarali dekhuraama; seye tomaloke kharakheda nakaraiba
Arau sihamte kaya, ‘yadi tomaloke satyabadi horaa tente koraa e'i pratisrauti ketiya purna ha’ba’

yadi kaphirasakale se'i samayara katha janilehemtena, yetiya sihamte sihamtara mukhamandala arau pithira paraa ju'i pratiraodha karaiba noraaraiba arau sihamtaka sahaya'o karaa naha’ba (tente sihamte se'i sastika kharakhedakai nibicarailehemtena)
Baram seya sihamtara oparata akasmikabharae ahiba arau sihamtaka hatabhamba karai diba. Phalata sihamte seya raodha karaiba noraaraiba arau sihamtaka arakaso diya naha’ba
Tomara purbe'o bahu raachulara lagata thatraa-bidraupa karaa haichila, parainamata sihamte yi bisaye thatraa-bidraupa karaichila se'itorae sihamtaka paraibestana karai laichila
Koraa, ‘raatite ha'omka ba dinate ha'omka rahamanara paraa kone tomalokaka raksa karaiba’? Tathapi'o sihamte nija pratipalakara smaranara paraa mukha ghuraa'i laya

Tente sihamtara enekuraa'o kichumana ilaha ache neki yiborae amara paraa sihamtaka raksa karaiba parae? Ihamte dekhuna nijake'i sahaya karaiba noraarae arau amara sastira paraa raksa pabalaiyo sihamte kono asrayadanakarai napaba

Baram amiye'i sihamtaka arau sihamtara pitr-purausasakalaka bhoga-sambhara dana karaichilo, lagate sihamtara ayu kala'o achila dighaliya. Sihamte dekha na'ine ye, ami prthiraikhanaka carai'ophalara paraa sankucita karai ani acho. Tathapi'o sihamte'i bijayi ha’bane
koraa, ‘ma'i kerala ahira dbaraahe tomalokaka satarka karao’; kintu yisakala badhira sihamtaka yetiya satarka karaa haya tetiya sihamte se'i ahbana nusune
Arau tomara pratipalakara sastira akanamano yadi sihamtaka sparsa karae tente arasye sihamte kai uthiba, ‘haya! Durbhagya amara, niscaya ami yalima achilo

arau kiyamatara dina ami n'yayabicarara tulacani sthapana karaima, seye karao prati kono dharanara an'yaya karaa naha’ba arau amala yadi sasya dana paraimana ojanarao haya tathapi'o ami seya upasthita karaima; arau hicapa grahanakarairaupe amiye'i yathesta
Arasye ami mucha arau haraunaka dana karaichilo phurakbana, yito muttakbisakalara babe jyoti arau upadesa
yisakale nedekhakaiye te'omlokara pratipalakaka bhaya karae arau te'omloke kiyamata samparke bhita-santrasta
Arau e'ito haiche barakatamaya upadesa, yito ami aratirna karaicho. Tathapi'o tomaloke iyaka asbikara karaibane
